overview: Live in Japan, is the live second album in the musical career of the quartet of crossover classical group Il Divo, after An Evening with Il Divo: Live in Barcelona, published in 2009.  The release shows the concert in Tokyo on 11 March 2014, in the Theatre Nippon Budokan. The CD/DVD â€˜Live in Japan' went on sale on November 12, 2014 in Japan and on December 1 in the rest of the world.  The artist Lea Salonga, invited by Il Divo to participate in some of the songs, collaborates with the group in some duets.
title: Il Divo: Live in Japan
